meanings.definition: The act of adding decorative molding to the top of a building.
meanings.sent1: The cornicings on the old house were beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: The architect included cornicings in the design of the new building.
meanings.sent3: The cornicings on the roof made the house look like a fancy cake.
meanings.sent4: The cornicings stood proudly atop the building, like a crown.
meanings.sent5: The intricate cornicings added a touch of elegance to the structure.

meanings.definition: The decorative molding added to the top of a building.
meanings.sent1: The cornicings were painted in vibrant colors to stand out.
meanings.sent2: The historic building's cornicings were carefully restored.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the cornicings as a playground.
meanings.sent4: The cornicings framed the building's silhouette against the sky.
meanings.sent5: Visitors admired the ornate cornicings as they approached the entrance.
